feat.value: They said about an old man, he dwelled in his house struggling
He saw the demons in a vision.
And the devil saw that he was defeated inside of the old man
And he went and revealed himself to him saying, 'I am Christ'.
After the old man saw him, he closed his eyes
and the devil said to him: 'Why did you close your eyes, I am Christ?'
And the old man said, 'I don't want to see Christ in this life'.
And the devil heard this and left him.
